email.pro_notification:
Hey %s!

We are emailing you to keep you up to date with the status of your Pro Account. You only have %s days left until it expires. Make sure you have enough funds in your account so that it will automatically renew.

If you want to cancel, don't top up your acount and it will be automatically canceled when the Pro Account period is over.

All the best to you!

input.profile_hit_timing_help: After how many hours should a visit to a profile, from the same ip count again.
input.title: Website title
input.default_language_help: To add more languages, please consult the documentation.
input.logo_help: jpg, jpeg and png accepted. Recommended size: Max height of 40px and transparrent.
input.analytics_code_help: Example: UA-22222222-33 ( Leave empty if you dont have Googele Analytics )
input.contact_email_help: The email that the users get the email from / the 'reply-to' email ( registration / email activation / lost password )
input.social_help: Display your website's socials in the footer of the website for users to reach you.
input.smtp_help: If there are no values entered then the system will try to use the default mail function.
input.smtp_from_help: The email that the users get the email from / the 'reply-to' email ( registration / email activation / lost password )
input.store_currency_help: Make sure to add a valid currency code for both Stripe and PayPal depending on your needs.
input.email_pro_due_date_help: Send an notification email to the user when their Pro account is about to expire. Insert the number of days before their expiration when the email should be sent.

display.available_buttons_help: Here you can control ( add / remove / edit ) social buttons that are available for users. This field needs to be verified JSON. Please do not edit if you don't know what you're doing.
display.available_themes_help: Here you can control ( add / remove / edit ) predefined gradient backgrounds that are available for users. This field needs to be verified JSON. Please do not edit if you don't know what you're doing.
display.main_link_types_help: Main Link Types are the buttons that users are allowed to set as their main button on the profile. Here you can add more, edit and delete those.

error_message.invalid_json: Invalid json, please take a closer look or roll back to the default values.
